title: What is your advice for writing rock music? - Quora

response.answer_text: A5 and B5 power chords. Actual chords (mostly minor), pentatonic blues scales, string bends (half bends, ghost bends and pre-bends rather than full bends, I wouldn’t go that far). Get a blues driver pedal (either an Ibanez Tube Screamer or a Boss Blues driver), a capo (G7 preferably)and a wah pedal (a general Dunlop wah is awesome in general) You may want a blues slide, it will help to add range in your playing.
https://soundcloud.com/user-259205324/rock-showwavDrink a lot of beer and write down the first thing that comes to mind.One of mine right here. peace
What kind of ROCK? 3 chord rock? Progressive rock? Jazz rock? There are a lot of directions you can go with that question.
